description:
At home chasing flowy singletrack or the perfect americano.

  • Fits medium faces best
  • Polarized lenses cut glare and reflections on water, snow or pavement
  • Notches in the frame increase airflow to reduce fogging
  • 3 sizes of rubber nose pads let you dial in the perfect fit
  • Anti-slip nose pads and temple tips keep the glasses in place
  • TR90 thermoplastic frames are flexible, durable and light
  • 6-base lens curve offers great coverage
name: Ryders Eyewear Pemby Sunglasses - Unisex

specs.key: Visible Light Transmission (Black Red/Green Lens Silv)
Visible Light Transmission (Blue Orange/Brown Lens Si)
